resources.string: Hey, it is not a Lockall QR (☉_☉)
Do you really want to pair with this device? Do it in a place where nobody can steal your QR or all your passwords are in serious danger! (⌐■_■)\nTap the camera to confirm.
Hey, it is not an OTP QR (☉_☉)
Do you really want to add this OTP? Do it in a place where nobody can steal your QR or your 2FA may become useless! (⌐■_■)\nTap the camera to confirm.
